body.name: Baby Trend Sit N’ Stand 5-in-1 Shopper Plus Stroller, Kona
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 20 hrs 1 min
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 20 hrs 1 min
features: Amazing Storage Solution with Innovative MagneTec Basket and Bench Tote: Extra-large MagneTec storage basket holds parents’ key essentials. The included Bench Tote easily attaches to the Shopper Bench for extra storage
With the Bench Tote and MagneTec basket, parents can hold up to 50 lbs of necessities (30 lbs for the MagneTEC Basket and 20 lbs for the Bench Tote).
EXCLUSIVE COMFORT CABIN: Includes removable extra-long canopy with UPF 50+ protection; deluxe fabrics and multi-layered padding provide premium comfort
HANDY PARENT PERKS: Modern parent console with multi-directional cell phone positioner and extra-deep flex-grip cup holders
Lightweight for Easy Maneuverability and Storage: Lightweight frame and streamlined design for easy maneuverability. Super-fast compact and self-standing fold offers ease of use
Versatile Stroller: 5 modes of use to accommodate your growing family
body.description: The Baby Trend® Sit N’ Stand® 5-in-1 Shopper Plus Stroller is perfect for your growing family. With the new compact and streamlined frame, our Sit N’ Stand® 5-in-1 Shopper Stroller has 5 modes of use – (1) Car seat travel system mode, (2) Car seat in the front seat with sibling on platform, (3) Child in the stroller seat only, (4) Child in the stroller seat with sibling sitting on bench, and (5) Child in the stroller seat with sibling standing. The front and back seats can hold kids up to 50lbs each. Sit N' Stand 5-in-1 Shopper Plus offers ultimate storage solutions with its included Bench Tote and MagneTec™ Basket. The Bench Tote can be easily attached to the Shopper’s bench for extra storage, or it can be used separately as a shopping tote! Designed with mesh siding, easy-grip handle and perfect size, it holds 20lbs of your strolling necessities or groceries. With the innovative MagneTec™ Basket, parents can open and close the basket very quickly with the help of strong magnets to hold the basket closed. This practical extra-large basket and tote together can hold up to 50lbs of parents’ essentials – groceries, toys, diaper bags, etc. Strolling with our Sit N’ Stand® Shopper Stroller will be a breeze with your little ones. Your children will appreciate Comfort Cabin, which includes a removable extra-long canopy with UPF 50+ protection, multi-position reclining seat, deluxe fabrics and premium padding that will keep them safe and comfy, staying away from the harmful sun rays. Parents will love our Parent Premiums that include a modern parent console with multi-directional cell phone positioner and extra-deep cup holders. Plus, mom and dad now can easily access the large storage basket from the front or back!

Bench Tote The Bench Tote can be easily attached to the Shopper’s bench for extra storage, or it can be used separately as a shopping tote! Designed with mesh siding, easy-grip handle and perfect size, it holds 20lbs of your strolling necessities or groceries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact sit and stand
reviews.reviewText: Love the design and style. This is a more compact sit and stand. Comes with extra cargo under storage. Pulls out and is magnetic which makes it easy to push back in. Great locking breaks. Easy to use canopy to protect from sun and rain. Goes on and off easily. Front seat can sit a child up to clothing size 7/8. Sit and stand maxed out child size can be up to clothing size 10/12. Even if you don’t need it for two kids, it has the perfect amount of space that can hold bags/purses/backpacks.It’s got that extra room.Stroller is perfect for traveling.Can fit in a gate check storage bag.Definitely recommend.*comparison wise, I would compare this to a Chicco Bravo 2. But affordable.Ships quick. Easy to put together. Well packaged and protected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I needed for my 2 & 4 year old. It has space for each of them to sit comfortably, there’s space in the bottom basket, it folds easily, and does not take up too much space.My only dislikes, so far are that the shade canopy hooks off real easily when I fold and unfold the stroller. Also, the seatbelt for where my 4 year old sits is a bit hard to loosen/tighten and sort of sits awkwardly. Besides these two things, it’s still a great stroller for the price and just what I needed to be able to push my babies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best sit-stand stroller!
reviews.reviewText: If you’re looking for a sit-stand stroller (at a low price), GET THIS ONE. Seriously. We started with the big in-line convertible double stroller from Baby Trend, and this one is SO MUCH BETTER. It’s smaller folded up (can fit in car trunks and our travel double stroller bag now), it’s so much easier to navigate (I can use one hand!), all of the cup holders are bigger, the front seat reclines more, the canopy is huge and actually works, the foot wheel locks are sooo much easier to use, and the bottom storage basket is not only bigger but easily accessible two different ways. My only complaint is you can’t fold it up with one hand, and unfolding it takes a little finesse. But Baby Trend seriously took all of the bad reviews about the other stroller and fixed them with this one. And the seat is sooo soft and plush, my baby actually cried because I was taking him OUT of the stroller—he usually cries when he has to go in it! Look no further, this is the best bang for your buck by far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice size for two kids
reviews.reviewText: Purchased to accommodate a 2 year old and 5 year old. And I needed a stroller not a stroller wagon for travel reasons since wagons are not considered strollers and would require to be checked in as luggage.Got a good deal on price purchased as returned item open box.Lots of space. Easy to set up. Turns easily. Looks nice. Folds easily. A little heavy but I guess expected considering it’s for two kids. Nice parent tray.I have a Graco snug connect car seat and it seems compatible, with a strap. Not SUPER secure but doable for short periods on even surfaces. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best value/ overall an excellent stroller
reviews.reviewText: I did a lot of research and comparison before buying, and after using it daily for a few weeks I can say I’m very pleased with this purchase. I’ve had quite a few strollers over the years, and I’d be happy with it even if it had cost a bit more - but ESPECIALLY considering the low price, this is definitely 5 stars for the value.Here’s what I like about it, and why I chose it:1. Price! Frankly, I could afford to buy a much fancier combo, but experience (I’ve got kids ranging from zero to 9) tells me that you don’t need a stroller like this for that long. In a year or two I’m much more likely to reach for my city mini when taking my two youngest for a long walk or a trip to an outdoor event, etc. The main purpose of this stroller is to use for errands and grocery runs, not for heavy duty long time use. Doesn’t make sense to splurge.2. I love that it comes with the car seat and base, and requires no adapters.3. It is surprisingly agile, like a much more expensive stroller, and can be easily maneuvered with one hand.4. Great cup holder and good sized basket.5. Pretty lightweight, and doesn’t take up as much space as a “full” double stroller. I didn’t want a full 2 seater bc A) they’re huge and heavy and B) toddlers usually want to walk anyway. The little jump seat and standing board are perfect to be able to contain a toddler or give them a place to rest when tired, without being an enormous double.Here are a few drawbacks or design flaws, none of which cause me any serious problems:1. My toddler sometimes reaches his foot out and steps on the brakes. I’m teaching him not to do this. Still, the brakes are easy to engage and easy to lift and are well placed for convenience, so I’m not sure where else they would put them. I think it’s just a thing you have to discourage your kid from doing.2. The canopy/shade could be a little better. It works great for giving full coverage to the baby carrier, but can’t really cover both children fully. Still, even my more expensive strollers fail to cover 100% (feet and legs are left exposed) so this is nothing new. I toss 2 cheap ponchos under all my strollers so if we get caught In the rain, I have one to wear and one to drape over the stroller. This has worked out great for years.3. It’s not a super smooth one-hand fold, as you can start the fold with one hand but you kind of need to use your other hand to yank it all the way closed. Really not a big deal.All in all, very pleased with this purchase and highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m glad I purchased and wish I would have gotten it sooner! It’s meant for 2 kids but I put 3 on it and it holds the weight. I have a 2,3 & 4 year old. 2 yr sits up front my 3 yr old sits in the middle with her legs in the basket and my 4 yr old stands on the back. They love it and think it’s so fun. Even though my daughter puts her legs in the basket, there is still room to be able to put stuff down there! Also I have a Honda accord and it fits my trunk! Although Honda accords do have a bigger trunk space then most I believe it would fit other sedans as well. I have mine in there now and was able to also fit groceries in the trunk. This stroller would be good for kids that can sit up on there own and have that back strength. The straps up front secure the child very well. Over all I’m happy and it’s affordable. Side note I tried the normal sit and stand and I do not recommend if you have a Sedan! It does not fit. I forced one in my trunk and it’s a nightmare to get in and out. So get the Sit & Stand Shopper!
Me encanto es fuerte y muy elegante fácil de operar recomendada
No llegó la charola frontal, podría enviármela por favor para NO devolver el producto. Gracias.
Other than the weight, everything else is near perfect for what we needed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent value for what its worth!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. First of all, very happy with delivery.. it was done as promised and arrived in good condition.. usual price is $352, bought it on sale for $132.. assembled and impressed by how easy to assemble and how sturdy it is.. very good value stroller.. for 2 kids, can carry water, some stuff like milk and water, clothes and bag compartment, really excellent! Thanks seller!

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy funcional la carriola, me encanto y el tamaño es adecuado.
reviews.reviewText: Me encanto, el color, la carriola, el tamaño, lo único malo fue que mi portabebe no quedó 😕 pero la carriola es muy funcional.
